file_insights.description: Added aria-label attributes to two action IconButtons (Edit and Delete)
specifics: Line 360: Added aria-label="Edit contact" to Edit IconButton
Line 363: Added aria-label="Delete contact" to Delete IconButton

patterns_discovered.description: Adding aria-label attributes to icon-only buttons to improve screen reader accessibility
patterns_discovered.context: Icon buttons without text content require aria-label or aria-labelledby for semantic accessibility
patterns_discovered.implementation: Matching aria-label text with existing title attribute values for consistency

patterns_discovered.description: Both title and aria-label attributes are now present on the same elements
patterns_discovered.context: IconButtons already had title attributes which provide tooltip text
patterns_discovered.note: This is a valid approach - title provides hover tooltip while aria-label provides screen reader context

gotchas_discovered.description: Same text ('Edit contact', 'Delete contact') now appears in both title and aria-label attributes
gotchas_discovered.impact: Minor: Some screen readers may announce both, but this is acceptable for icon-only buttons
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Text is consistent between attributes, reducing confusion

gotchas_discovered.description: Only the two action buttons in the contact row were updated
gotchas_discovered.impact: Other icon buttons in the page (if any) may still lack aria-labels
gotchas_discovered.scope: Limited to the specific subtask requirements

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully added aria-label attributes to both Edit and Delete IconButtons in ContactsPage
approach_outcome.method: Direct attribute addition matching existing title attribute values
approach_outcome.execution: Clean, minimal diff with no additional changes or side effects
approach_outcome.testing_approach: Accessibility compliance improvement (no visible behavior changes)

recommendations.suggestion: Consider creating a reusable pattern for action button groups with consistent aria-labels
recommendations.rationale: If other pages have similar action button patterns, extracting to a component would ensure consistency

recommendations.suggestion: Audit entire ContactsPage for other icon buttons lacking aria-labels
recommendations.rationale: Ensure comprehensive accessibility coverage beyond just the action buttons in contact rows

recommendations.suggestion: Document the aria-label convention (matching title text) in accessibility guidelines
recommendations.rationale: Helps future developers apply consistent accessibility patterns across the codebase

recommendations.suggestion: Run automated accessibility testing (axe, lighthouse) to verify improvements
recommendations.rationale: Confirms WCAG compliance and catches any remaining accessibility issues
